name: Battle for Treasure
description:
How many secrets and dangers lie in the vast expanses of the oceans and seas! In just one look at the immense waves, a spark of a thirst for adventure, a desire for wealth and fame is hidden in the very soul of every Viking. But adventure requires courage, tactics and comprehensive preparation.
Under your leadership, the ship with the sonorous name Drakkar will go to unknown lands, where secrets and treasures attract with their mystery. You have to manage a team of brave warriors who are ready to conquer any territory in order to find and capture ancient towers that store incomprehensible riches and powerful artifacts.
However, the path to glory cannot be passed without a fight with the defenders of the towers, devoted minions of evil. You will have to fight enemies, develop a strategy and plan every action in order to win.
To complete the level, the player needs to capture all the towers on the map and destroy all enemies.
Forward, to new horizons and incomparable adventures! Prove to everyone that you are not just a Viking, but a real legendary leader!
